damn!

about the seeds not showing up, it simply depends what program you are using to download torrent files. the reason seeds are not appearing in the list is because they are most likely long time seeds (or LT seeds), wich means they no longer have the torrent in thier sharing list, but they still have the files so it will keep uploading anyway, these lLT seeds only show up on some torrent clients such as bitcomet, but wether they appear or not you can still be downloading from them, presuming thier computer is on. hope this helped a little
